title: Lynda - Writing to be Heard on LinkedIn
description:
Lynda - Writing to be Heard on LinkedIn

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

30m 26s Appropriate for all Oct 20, 2015   | Uploaded in Jan 5, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject: Business 
Software: LinkedIn 
Author: Daniel Roth 

LinkedIn is the one of the world's largest long-form publishing platforms. Writing on LinkedIn allows you to develop a following, demonstrate expertise in your field, and connect with new opportunitiesâ€”all at a scale never before possible. But how do you make sure your voice is heard? Daniel Roth, executive editor at LinkedIn, introduces the best practices for writing great posts and offers tips for amplifying your reach on LinkedIn.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Writing what you know
	â€¢	Remembering your audience
	â€¢	Crafting great headlines that get clicks
	â€¢	Handling comments
	â€¢	Sharing content on LinkedIn and beyond
